product_name: Merrell Mix Master Move Glide Cross-Training Shoes - Women's
long_description: The women's Merrell Mix Master Move Glide cross-training shoes add a thin, lightweight layer of cushioning to a minimalist-inspired design for all-day training, playing and adventuring.
short_description: The women's Merrell Mix Master Move Glide cross-training shoes add a thin, lightweight layer of cushioning to a minimalist-inspired design for all-day training, playing and adventuring.
